item.title: Next Time I Go Out Imma Teach Got a Lesson
item.description: [chorus] next time I go out Ima teach God a lesson next time I go out Ima teach God a lesson next time I go out Ima teach God a lesson gotta lesson from the drunk shaman well tortured to death there's snow on his sleeve I make a plan to fuck for a living believe wouldn't you these discoveries my discoveries stop pissin on mom so next time I go out Imma leave a note pro bono bonobo in peripheral tho goa koa my homie hobo as of late they my therapy today I need it i breath it I Greg Elementary my dear watson The ABCs of Boy Love
